iep_goals: Solve addition and subtraction problems within 20 using manipulatives with 75% accuracy
Recognize and continue simple patterns with 80% accuracy in 4 out of 5 trials
accommodations: Use of math manipulatives and visual aids

interviews.parent: Parent reports Zoe is sweet and tries hard but learns at a slower pace than peers.
interviews.teacher: Zoe is motivated and kind but needs significant support with academic concepts.

observations.psychologist: Below-average intellectual functioning across all domains; benefits from modified curriculum.
